page.title: 18A Day In The Life Of Leon.
page.content: At 6.40am I get up and have breakfast then I get washed and dressed and pack my bag. Then I leave for school. When I get to school we play football on the playground with a tennis ball. The bell goes at 8.50am for the start of school. Then we work until 10.30am. Then we have play time which lasts for 15 minutes. Then we work until 12.00 midday. We then have an hour for lunch. We start work again at 1.00pm. At 3.00pm we go home. I get changed and go to call for my friends. At 6.00pm I go in for my tea and go back out until 8.30pm. When I come in and watch television until 9.30pm.
